t:
“I will not be late for class,” weak and tired, I wrote for the hundredth time.


“Please ma'am, may I stop now?” I requested the teacher,
             “I'm almost out of blood.”
c:
“Keep writing. You're supposed to write this thousand times.”



#late #teacher #class #punishment #blood #writing
#spookiansclub #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with Spookians Club
